name: CAP_PAY_EL_MATCH_RIDER
description:
This table will be deprecated. To continue accessing this data, use the MATCHED_RIDER_PLAN_ID column from the CAP_PAY_EL_DETAILS table.





The riders matched to when returning the rate.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the transaction record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: MATCHED_RIDER_PLAN_ID
columns.description: This column will be deprecated. To continue accessing this data, use the MATCHED_RIDER_PLAN_ID column from the CAP_PAY_EL_DETAILS table.  The riders used to select the rate groups from the lookup table.
